review_data.title: Good cordon bleu
review_data.content: Good place to enjoy classic swiss dishes and a nice atmosphere. Service was good and prices are reasonable. The restaurant serves dishes with focus on meat and cheese. Cordon bleu tastes good. Vegetable sides not really good (probably frozen product).

review_data.title: Our regular Christmas party venue, love it!
review_data.content: This is the third year using this venue for our christmas party fondue. I think its great. Perfect for our needs. Good food, reasonably prices, great friendly service. For a group get together I highly recommend this place.
